title: Petition for scuttle to flash mastery 7 whenever she eats honeyfruit
body:
Title


Edit: Scuttle should also say "Git gud" in chat

Edit 2: Wow 200 upvotes

replies.body:
DID YOU JUST ASSUME SCUTTIE'S GENDER

https://d1sui4xqepm0ps.cloudfront.net/categories/triggered?image=cdn

UPDATE: Guys chill lol, it's a joke in the Memes and Games boards.
Relaaaaaxx
It's been confirmed that it was a she?
In recent patch notes, a rioter referred to her as a she.
http://i.imgur.com/qju5UHg.jpg

Everyone hates you

https://i.imgflip.com/yad1s.jpg

Memes and Games tag, friend.
Memes and Games.

You should probably head back to the Gameplay boards.
Wow, you broke character. What a cuck
I do not think that "cuck" means what you think it means.

Lmfao this 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
https://www.growtopiagame.com/forums/attachment.php?attachmentid=132753&d=1469397141

you broke character?
https://i.gyazo.com/def435ba6108bd8b18782e2643de63bf.png
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/h5Mojfebwn8/maxresdefault.jpg
http://i.imgur.com/avHnbUZ.gif?noredirect
Not everyone, just people with selective humour who took him seriously or were triggered about overuse of triggered memes. I don't feel pain in my ass for him posting triggered memes.

Same here lol

PEOPLE IT IS JUST A MEME

> [{quoted}](name=Spaceman5pff,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=BgHB4NxT,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2017-02-03T19:28:03.098+0000)
>
> DID YOU JUST ASSUME SCUTTIE'S GENDER
> 
> https://d1sui4xqepm0ps.cloudfront.net/categories/triggered?image=cdn
> 
> UPDATE: Guys chill lol, it's a joke in the Memes and Games boards.
> Relaaaaaxx

I think it's now confirmed **both** are 'she,' as of the 'EXECUTED' article.
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/executed-terrible-truth-about-jungle-monsters
"We excluded Scuttlecrab from this list because she's a nice gal who'd never hurt anybody."
At least 1 was confirmed female for a while now though. (As other's said, a patch note somewhere a while back..)

Which makes me a little sad. My headcanon was Herald side was she, and dragon side was he, and they were both wondering back and forth looking for each other. Lost, scared, and lonely, but were always too afraid to cross lanes to keep looking for each other. Probably because of their 'safe' spot. (Side note: you never actually 'kill' scuttles, they just run to their hiding spot and become a ward/speed boost when they take near lethal damage, and stay 'hidden' till they heal their wounds. But maybe if they ever got too far away from hiding spot, they would actually die?)

I think I'm still going to think of dragon side one as 'he,' regardless of what Riot says.

Fk u rito, you can't take my tragic romance away from me!!11 {{item:3070}}

Jesus christ you can EXPLAIN it is a joke and people STILL don't get it is a joke.

Also, your entire headcannon (minus gender) can still exist if you stop excluding homosexuality as a real thing.

> [{quoted}](name=Spaceman5pff,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=BgHB4NxT,comment-id=000700020000,timestamp=2017-02-04T23:16:19.057+0000)
>
> Jesus christ you can EXPLAIN it is a joke and people STILL don't get it is a joke.
> 
> Also, your entire headcannon (minus gender) can still exist if you stop excluding homosexuality as a real thing.

Well...reproductive values. Sure a female scuttlebutt can love another female scuttlebutt. But can they make little future scuttebuttlings? *-coining that word now too, btw, 'scuttebuttlings', it's mine, don't use it >:O*
Where's the next generation??
Or our we hunting an extremely endangered species? FOR A WARD. FOR A WARD FOR CHRIST SAKE?? Last 2 scuttles on the planet, they're both female, and in love...and we're trying to kill one. FOR.A.WARD.
Also if they are both female...and there keeps being new ones...
Maybe we have like some Jurassic Park shit going on. Females cloned from females from DNA trapped in amber. So we're hunting an *extinct* species.
Is this the kinda world you wanna live in Frank??

I like my headcannon better. You monster.

Or some sort of special emote like they made for Snowdown and stuff, but make it a smiley eating face emoticon or something, and whenever it changes directions or dodges a skills hot or something maybe a scared emote
Something like that would be cool
I'm for that mastery 7.
Or flash a mastery 7 whenever scuttle dashes and dodges a skillshot, then says git gud
Yes, that would be great

Have her flash it If you get executed by her. I know what you are thinking, but trust me, there must be elo low enough to achieve such thing despite its impossibility. Trust me, I'm Bronze I, I've seen wonders beyond imagination.
Master Yi used to have a bug that let him deal damage to himself. So it is, in fact, possible to get killed fighting scuttle crab. Also, Teemo shrooms can be activated by scuttle, lol
Maybe in the very rare sub 500 mmr games (Yes it is possible, but there are probably more people in Challenger and LCS than are in those ranks) they find some way to be executed by it.
Can Ivern not kill himself by doing Scuttle? I mean, getting camps consumes health, so...
no, you cant use his passive if you are low enough to die if you would
Oh. *cries in disappointment*
Why is being a little shit so deeply ingrained in the identity of this community. Maybe I'm just getting old.
It's probably both.
scuttie eats them? she isn't just sitting on them?
Yep, the feature was added a few patches ago.

Oh. I always thought Scuttlecrab was confusing the plant with a mate.
Thanks for clearing that up.
i'm still killing it and taking the extra mana. because league has made me a horrible person!
I was already a horrible person before league.
If Scuttles can flash a rank 7 when she jukes you and/or eats honeyfruit, then minions should flash a rank 7 and be fully healed when/if they kill you.
no. make them do that when they juke your skillshots

400th Upvote
{{champion:202}}
amazingly this comment has exactly 4 answers
[This also needs to play when it happens](https://youtu.be/twtW2qG8P0g?t=13s)
THIS.NEEDS.TO.HAPPEN.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} If I'v ever wanted to be BM'd by someone it's a mastery 7 scuttle crab.
What if the scuttle also got the scent of the honeyfruit like Warwick and it drove him crazy and got an additional 100% movement speed towards it so it was a race? :D

I always thought it would be funny if  scuttle randomly became enraged and started chasing you down in the river (Like a 3% chance per auto). It would crit every hit, move as fast as it's dash move, and if you aren't on a tank jg it two-shots you. I think this would be a hilarious thing to add during april fools or something, how pissed would you be if scuttle just turns around and killed you!
Like hitting chickens in ocarina of time
Not even joking. This is propably one of the best petitions out there.
What is this doing in memes and games. Get this on the gameplay section ;)
